title: Credentials presented by two High Commissioners and six Ambassadors
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Sudath Silva) Two High Commissioners and six Ambassadors were newly appointed to Sri Lanka and have presented their credentials to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the President’s Office on 14 February 2011. They presented their letters of credence at the formal reception organized by Ministry of External Affairs…
